name: Abstractio
description:
A hard and minimalist action game about abstract concepts. Face harder and harder challenges and show you are able to get to the end!

- 26 levels based on numbers and letters!

- Challenging gameplay! 

 - Puzzle elements.

  - New levels still been added.

  - For free.

This is my first game on android and I really hope you like the experience! I'd appreciate any feedback, suggestions, and criticism.
